import React from "react"; import Tab from "react-bootstrap/Tab"; import Tabs from "react-bootstrap/Tabs"; function TabNav() { function convertToJPG() { var pngFile = document.getElementById('png-file').files[0]; var pngImage = new Image(); var canvas = document.createElement('canvas'); var ctx = canvas.getContext('2d'); var imgData; pngImage.onload = function() { canvas.width = pngImage.width; canvas.height = pngImage.height; ctx.drawImage(pngImage, 0, 0); imgData = canvas.toDataURL('image/jpeg'); document.getElementById('jpg-image').src = imgData; }; pngImage.src = URL.createObjectURL(pngFile); } return ( <>
